meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a manatoid.
meanings.sent1: The manatoid creature had a large, round body and flippers for swimming.
meanings.sent2: The manatoid fish gracefully glided through the water.
meanings.sent3: The manatoid costume at the party was so realistic, it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her movements on the dance floor were as smooth and graceful as a manatoid swimming in the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The manatoid sculpture captured the essence of the sea creature perfectly.

meanings.definition: A creature or object that is similar to a manatoid.
meanings.sent1: The toy manatoid looked just like the real sea creature.
meanings.sent2: The manatoid in the movie was a friendly character that helped the main hero.
meanings.sent3: The manatoid plush toy became the child's favorite cuddle buddy.
meanings.sent4: The spaceship in the sci-fi game resembled a manatoid with its sleek design.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious shadow in the water turned out to be a manatoid, surprising the onlookers.
